Question
========

Which random variable *X* is a discrete variable? \ I A soccer team plays 12 games in a given season. Suppose *X* is the number of games that this team won.Ê II A woman buys a lottery ticket every week in which the probability of winning of 1 euro is 1/10. Suppose *X* is her winnings after one year.Ê. III A student waits for a bus to pass by every ten minutes. Suppose *X* is the number of minutes he waits at the bus stop.

Answerlist
----------

* I and II are discrete variables.
* I and III are discrete variables.
* II and III are discrete variables.
* All of them are discrete variables.
* None of them are discrete variables.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* I and II are discrete variables...: Correct
* I and III are discrete variables...: Incorrect
* II and III are discrete variables...: Incorrect
* They are all discrete variables...: Incorrect
* None of them are discrete variables...: Incorrect
